column5: Looking for a place to stay midweek next week in the haliburtons. Would like to rent a cottage, preferrably on a smaller waterbody because all i'll have is my 12' inflatable with an electric motor. Any good suggestions?
Call Ken at Kashaga Lodge.  It isn't pretty but its pretty cheap and has all you need.
id also recommend kenesis lake lodge... also not pretty(lake and dock area is ) .. but the price is right

A friend rennted a place on Oak lake north of Havelock. The lake is only about 1.5 miles square and they found fish easily. Sorry I do not know the name of the cottages he rented from but you could google the lake and see what shows up.
Probably Leisure Cottages.  I considered going there for an ice fishing trip last winter.
Beautiful lake and super nice owners!!
Thanks everyone kindly for your information. I believe my girlfriend likes the oak lake idea, so that will likely be where we go. Thanks again, much appreciated!
